snippet.title: Put The Shovel Down
snippet.description:
Despite what you might have heard, you DON'T have to "hit bottom" to find recovery.  Nor do you have to stand by and do nothing while a loved one sabotages their life (and yours) with their addiction.  There are many things you can do to help yourself/a loved one (you're not completely powerless).  Once you understand how addiction works (psychologically), you'll be able to accurately predict what's coming next and make a plan for how to respond to the situation effectively.  It's time to stop making decisions reactively (emotionally) and get strategic.  Don't allow addiction to take anything else from you. 

We want to empower you with the knowledge and skills to recover yourself and your family back from addiction. Follow this channel to stay 5 Steps Ahead of Addiction at all times!  


💖 Access Our Free Addiction Recovery Resources: https://www.familyrecoveryacademy.online/free-resources
